ModMetaData.name: Free the Nipple
ModMetaData.author: OkraDonkey
ModMetaData.description:
Uncovered torsos no longer cause women to feel naked and embarrassed. (Uncovered legs still cause both men and women to feel naked.)
### Compatibility - Compatible with RimWorld **v1.1**, **v1.2**, and the **Royalty** DLC. - No known incompatibilities.
### Notes - Should be safe to add or remove at any time from your save. - Can be placed anywhere in the mod list after Harmony. - Doesn't add or remove anything - it just alters the PsychologicallyNude method to evaluate females the same as males. - This is my first Harmony mod, so please feel free to make technical suggestions or otherwise critique the code.
### Inspired by u/warm-rimmer
